nodes.text: ThunderForce was a mercenary unit that was active during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It was made up of highly trained soldiers and specialized in ground combat and small unit tactics. They were often employed by corporate or local governments and rarely worked for the Empire.
It was divided into two companies, Dazzle Company and Flash Company. Each company was divided into eight platoons. The force was spread over three bases and two training facilities among two systems.
